doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Sushanta Kumar Sarkar
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Sushanta Kumar Sarkar is a highly respected neurosurgery specialist in Bogura, with expertise in brain, nerve, spine, and stroke-related conditions. He holds an MBBS and MS in Neurosurgery from BSMMU and currently serves as Professor and Head of the Department of Neurosurgery at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital, where he also previously held the position of Vice Principal. Dr. Sarkar provides treatment for a wide range of neurological conditions including brain tumors, spinal cord injuries, stroke, herniated discs, nerve compression syndromes, and traumatic brain injuries. He sees patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra, located at House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura. His visiting hours are from 3pm to 6pm, except on Fridays.

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Dr. Milton Kumer Saha
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Milton Kumer Saha is a Neurosurgeon in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Neurosurgery at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Milton Kumer Saha at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4:30pm to 8pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).

chamber.address: House # 12/310, Thanthania Bus Stand, Sherpur Road, Bogura

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Fazlul Haque
doctor.workplace: Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Fazlul Haque is a Neurosurgeon in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Neurosurgery). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Neurosurgery at Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Fazlul Haque at Ibn Sina Diagnostic & Consultation Center, Bogra is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Mon & Friday).
